name: Dragon
changelog:
- 1.5.1 -
If you didn't know, the creator of this client, ArceusMatt, has gone MIA without any notices. So one of his old friends, Johnmacrocraft, continues his awesome work. There is no new Discord server yet, but I'm planning to make a new one since the original server no longer exists.

Because of his mistake (I guess), the original 1.5.0 version doesn't work, along with 1.4.5.2 (1.4.5.2 is intended). Please update to 1.5.1 to keep using Dragon client.

- 1.5.0 -
Thank you for 300 followers on twitter,
Thank you for 1k on discord,
Thanks for 4k views & 900 subs on YT,
Thanks nsitf for promotional vids,
Happy halloween,
I hope you enjoy this long waited update. - ArceusMatt
...
Added a browser,
Browser displays item list or anime,
Added Line tracers to ESP,
Added ESP(particle) range setting,
Added Fightaura,
Fixed CrouchTP,
Added setting to switch Give input to id:data,
Removed settings category,
Hold down module for settings,
(Change colors in exit button settings)
(Keybind & others in dragon button settings)
Added (B) to buggy module names,
Added setting to change Give keyboard,
Added (R) to realm module names,
Added module descriptions in each setting,
Added nametags(beta),
Fixed some combat & esp related modules randomly stops working,
Fixed the toggle list display at the top right,
Added setting to move toggle list to left or right,
Added halloween colors,
Added sing (new songs will be added without notice),
Improvements & bug fixes.

- 1.4.5.2 -
Fixed aimbot frozen,
Fixed hitbox not working.

- 1.4.5.1 -
There was a crashing problem.

- 1.4.5 -
New render category,
Some special surprises,
Made some backgrounds transparent,
Friend system revamp,
Promoted servers revamp,
View dragon user count,
View module count,
Improvements & bug fixes.

- 1.4.4 -
Movable button setting,
Button gravity,
Changelog

- 1.4.3 -
ChestESP renamed to CustomESP,
Item ESP,
CrouchTP,
Hover aura,
TPaura,
Mob ESP,
PlayerFinder for old toolbox only,
Movement detector added to HUD,
Compass added to HUD,
CustomESP particle lines,
Removed ESP lag,
Removed combat lag,
Sneak aura,
Highjump settings,
Xray,
CustomESP settings,
ESP updates automatically,
No more ESP crashes,
Fixed bugs & improvements.

- 1.4.2 -
Highjump,
Movable jump button,
Spawn mobs,
Removed ip query,
Removed server query,
More promoted servers,
Bug fixes,
Improvements.

- 1.4.0 -
Spam bypass settings,
Commands(use !help),
Mcpe color settings,
ESP color settings,
Check update button,
Promoted servers,
Fixed ghost button,
Add EXP,
No more solid colors,
Improvements,
New god enchant -> old god enchant,
Elevator height settings,
Reduced bulky dialogs,
IP/domain query(may not work)

- 1.3.0 -
Emergency update.
(We removed updates from github)

- 1.2 -
New max enchant levels in settings,
Glide keybind,
Survival fly keybind,
Instant totem keybind,
ArmorESP keybind,
Player ESP/Tracers,
Chest ESP/Tracers(very laggy),
Fixed illegal enchant checker,
HUD now shows your armor damage,
Fixed vertical orientation,
Fixed dialogs not having correct titles,
Auto-updater now includes changelog

- 1.1 -
TapTP fixed,
Mob aimbot,
ArmorESP,
Buttons are improved,
Hold button down for description,
Twerk fixed,
Tutorials that update often,
AutoSprint,
Connection information,
Auto-updater fixed,
Setting for menu orientation,
Riding modules,
Korean translation,
Brightness/fullbright,

- 1.0 -
Dragon release.
